item.title: The First Post
item.description: print("Hello World!") This note is spent to introduce briefly about myself: My name’s HÆ°ng, currently live and work in Hanoi. I graduated from Hanoi University of Transport and Communications with Road & Bridge Engineering Degree. After few years working as a Civil Engineer, I decided to change the career path to become a Software Engineer. I love engineering in general, especially software & machine learning then it will be the main topic of this blog.
